channel.title: Alfred Grimhands Barcrawl miniquest

item.title: Alfred Grimhands Barcrawl miniquest
item.dc:creator: @Mac1 Mac.
item.description:
@Mac1 wrote:

All Day:

Good work bruv.

It’s not just good, it’s great.

I’ve also taken a look at your previous releases, they’re pretty impressive as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Alfred Grimhands Barcrawl miniquest
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:8, topic:489775”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=608010.msg4237448#msg4237448 date=1361642546]

Could’ve been done better, but good job.(applies to all your latest releases)

Your work isn’t any better, in fact its worse.

Acting like you have seen any of my work. Plus, who are you to judge?
[/quote]
I have seen way too much of your work, in fact your work is an eye sore at the least.

Please go read about variables before you start hosting tinychat rooms showing your terrible coding skills, like you did while running your last server and gave us all a nice laugh.

Oh and about the judging, I figured since your always judging others and putting there work down, I’d be the judge of who’s was better, and his is better.[/quote]
You obviously haven’t seen anything. So, just stop acting like you have.

I haven’t put anybody down, I’m just saying the plain truth like I always do, which is that he did a good job but it could have been done better. I’m not trying to make it offensive on purpose.

Read full topic

item.title: Alfred Grimhands Barcrawl miniquest

@waj wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:7, topic:489775"][quote author=waj link=topic=608010.msg4237174#msg4237174 date=1361632443]

Could’ve been done better, but good job.(applies to all your latest releases)

Your work isn’t any better, in fact its worse.
[/quote]
Acting like you have seen any of my work. Plus, who are you to judge?[/quote]
I have seen way too much of your work, in fact your work is an eye sore at the least.

Please go read about variables before you start hosting tinychat rooms showing your terrible coding skills, like you did while running your last server and gave us all a nice laugh.

Oh and about the judging, I figured since your always judging others and putting there work down, I’d be the judge of who’s was better, and his is better.

Read full topic

item.title: Alfred Grimhands Barcrawl miniquest
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::::::::::::::::::::::::Barclaw Quests: Alfred Grimhand Barclaw card:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

“Finished got all blanks”

Note: You need to do this mini quest to enter the agility course**

Video:

Npc IDS for quest:
ID: 305 Barbarian guard
ID: 76 barbarian
ID: 302 kharid scorpion
ID: 3 chickens
ID: 306 Bartender (foresters arms: “seers village”)
ID: 142 Barmaid (rising sun: “falador”)
ID: 529 Bartender (rusty anchor: “port sarim”)
ID: 12 Bartender (The blue moon inn:“varrock”)
ID: 44 Bartender(the jolly boar inn:“varrock”)
ID: 279 Bartender(The Deadman’s chest:“Brimhaven”)

Item IDS for quest:
ID: 668 barcrawl card
ID: 10 coins
ID: 193 beer
ID: 267 Asgarnaian Ale
ID: 269 Drawven Stout

Quest notes:
0)some options have “cases”… if they have coins in inventory OR if they dont…
1)spawn 2 barbarian guards at coords: (x:495,y:544)
2)spawn 3 barbarians inside gate at coords: (X:491,Y:544)
3)spawn 3 chickens inside gate at coords: (x:487, Y:548)
4)spawn kharid scorpion at coords: (x:489,y:524)
5)foresters arms bartender (takes away 7 attack points, 7 defense, 5 woodcut levels, 5 fletching, and 5 firemaking levels)
6)Barmaid in Falador (the rising sun) (takes away 1 hp, 10 defense points, 10 attack points, 5 fishing levels)
7)spawn Bartender ID:529 at port sarim: (X:254, y:625)
8)Bartender in varrock (the blue moon inn) (takes away 1hp, 7 strength, 10 defense, 9 attack, 5 smithing levels)
9)Bartender in wild varrock (jolly boar inn) (takes away 3 strength levels, 3 defense, 2 attack, 5 mining, 5 crafting)
10)Bartender at brimhaven(deadmans chest) (takes away 14 attack levels, 15 defense, 5 prayer, 4 magic, 5 cooking levels, 5 herblaw levels)

PArt 1

Talk to barbarian guard:

	[code]public void run() {
	npcTalk("Oi whaddya want?");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"I want to come through this gate", "I want some money"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		comegate();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		cashplz();
	}
}
	private void comegate() {
	npcTalk("Barbarians only");
	npcTalk("Are you a barbarian?");
	npcTalk("You don't look like one");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Hmm, yep you've got me there", "Looks can be deceiving. I am in fact a barbarian"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		gotme();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		looks();
	}
}
	private void gotme() {
	}
}
	private void looks() {
	npcTalk("If you're a barbarian you need to be able to drink like one");
	npcTalk("We barbarians like a good drink");
	npcTalk("And I have the perfect challenge for you");
	npcTalk("The Alfred Grimhand barcrawl");
	npcTalk("First done by Alfred Grimhand");
	sendmessage("The guard hands you a barcrawl card");
----------------------Recieve Barcrawl Card in Inventory---------------- 
	npcTalk("Take that card to each of the bars named on it");
	npcTalk("The bartenders all know what it means");
	npcTalk("We're kinda well known");
	npcTalk("They'll give you their strongest drink and sign your card");
	npcTalk("When you done all that, we'll be happy to let you in");
	}
}	
	private void cashplz() {
	npcTalk("Well do I look like a banker to you?");
	}
}[/code]

Part 2

Retalking to barbarian guard after accepting the barclaw quest:

	[code]public void run() {
	npcTalk("So hows the barcrawl coming along?");
	playerTalk("I haven't finished it yet");
	npcTalk("Well come back when you have, you lightweight");
	}
}[/code]

Part 3

Reading the: “barcrawl card”:

	[code]sendmessage("The official Alfred Grimhand barcrawl");
	sendmessage("The jolly boar inn - not completed");
	sendmessage("The blue moon in - not completed");
	sendmessage("The rising sun - not completed");
	sendmessage("The dead man's chest - not completed");
	sendmessage("The forester's arms - not completed");
	sendmessage("The rusty anchor - not completed");[/code]

Part 4

Bartender in Seers village(Forester’s arms)

	[code]public void run() {
	npcTalk("Good morning, what would you like?");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"What do you have?", "Beer please", "I'm doing Alfred Grimhand's barcrawl", "I don't really want anything thanks"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		bar1();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		beer1();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		Alfred1();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		no1();
	}
}
	private void bar1() {
	npcTalk("Well we have beer");
	npcTalk("Or if you want some food, we have our home made stews and meat pies");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Beer please", "I'll try the meat pie", "Could I have some stew please", "I don't really want anything thanks"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		beer1();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		meatpie();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		stew();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		no1();
	}
}

Case 1: coins private void meatpie() {
NpcTalk(“Ok, that’ll be 16 gold”);
sendmessage(“You buy a nice hot meat pie”);
--------------------item: meat pie goes in inventory----------------------
}
}
Case 2: no coins private void meatpie() {
NpcTalk(“Ok, that’ll be 16 gold”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}
Case 1: Coins private void stew() {
npcTalk(“A bowl of stew, that’ll be 20 gold please”);
sendmessage(“You buy a bowl of home made stew”);
--------------------item: stew goes to inventory----------------------
}
}
Case 2: no coins private void stew() {
npcTalk(“A bowl of stew, that’ll be 20 gold please”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}
Case 1: coins private void beer1() {
NpcTalk(“one beer coming up”);
NpcTalk(“Ok, that’ll be two coins”);
sendmessage(“You buy a pint of beer”);
}
}
Case 2: no coins private void beer1() {
NpcTalk(“one beer coming up”);
NpcTalk(“Ok, that’ll be two coins”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}
CASE 1: coins private void Alfred1() {
npcTalk(“Oh you’re a barbarian then”);
npcTalk(“Now which of these was the barrels contained the liverbane ale?”);
npcTalk(“That’ll be 18 coins please”);
--------------------Takes 18 gp from inventory-----------------
sendmessage(“The bartender gives you a glass of liverbane ale”);
sendmessage(“You gulp it down”);
sendmessage(“The room seems to be swaying”);
sendmessage(“The bartender scrawls his signiture on your card”);
}
}
CASE 2: no coins private void Alfred1() {
npcTalk(“Oh you’re a barbarian then”);
npcTalk(“Now which of these was the barrels contained the liverbane ale?”);
npcTalk(“That’ll be 18 coins please”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}
private void no1() {
}
}[/code]

Part 5

Talk to Bartender in Falador (the rising sun):

	[code]public void run() {
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Hi what ales are you serving", "I'm doing Alfred Grimhand's 			barcrawl"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		ales1();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		Alfred2();
	}
}	
	private void ales1() {
	NpcTalk("Well you can either have a nice Asgarnian Ale or a Wizards Mind Bomb");
	NpcTalk("Or a Drawven Stout");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"One Asgarnian Ale please", "I'll try the mind bomb",''Can I have a Drawven Stout?", "I don't feel like any of those''});
	if(choice == 0) {
		asgarnian();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		mindbomb();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		stout();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		nofeel();
	}
}

Case 1: “coins” private void asgarnian() {
NpcTalk(“That’ll be two gold”);
sendmessage(“You buy an Asgarnian Ale”);
}
}
Case 2: “no coins” private void asgarnian() {
NpcTalk(“That’ll be two gold”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}
Case 1: coins private void mindbomb() {
NpcTalk(“That’ll be two gold”);
sendmessage(“you buy a pint of Wizard’s Mind Bomb”);
}
}
Case 2: “no coins” private void mindbomb() {
NpcTalk(“That’ll be two gold”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}
Case 1: “Coins” private void stout() {
NpcTalk(“That’ll be three gold”);
sendmessage(“you buy a pint of Drawven Stout”);
}
}
Case 2: “No coins” private void stout() {
NpcTalk(“That’ll be three gold”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}
private void nofeel() {
}
}
CASE 1: “coins” private void Alfred2() {
npcTalk(“Hehe this’ll be fun”);
npcTalk(“You’ll be after our off the menu hand of death penistail then”);
npcTalk(“Lots of expensive parts to the penistail though”);
npcTalk(“So it will cost you 70 coins”);
--------------------Takes 70 gp from inventory-----------------
sendmessage(“You buy a hand of death penistail”);
sendmessage(“You drink the penistail”);
------------------1 hp taken away from player------------------
sendmessage(“You stumble around the room”);
sendmessage(“The barmaid giggles”);
sendmessage(“The barmaid signs your card”);
}
}
CASE 2: “No coins” private void Alfred2() {
npcTalk(“Hehe this’ll be fun”);
npcTalk(“You’ll be after our off the menu hand of death penistail then”);
npcTalk(“Lots of expensive parts to the penistail though”);
npcTalk(“So it will cost you 70 coins”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}[/code]

Part 6

Talk to Bartender in Port Sarim (The rusty anchor):

	[code]public void run() {
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Could I buy a beer please?", "Have you heard any more rumors here?", "I'm doing Alfred Grimhand's barcrawl"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		beer2();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		Rumors();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		Alfred3();
	}
}

Case 1: “coins” private void beer2() {
NpcTalk(“Sure that will be 2 gold coins please”);
playerTalk(“Ok here you go thanks”);
sendmessage(“You buy a pint of beer”);
----------item recieved: ID: beer---------------
}
}
Case 2: “no coins” private void beer2() {
NpcTalk(“Sure that will be 2 gold coins please”);
sendmessage(“You dont have enough coins for the beer”);
}
}
private void Rumors() {
NpcTalk(“No it hasn’t been very busy lately”);
}
}
CASE 1: “coins” private void Alfred3() {
npcTalk(“Are you sure you look a bit skinny for that”);
playerTalk(“Just give me watever drink I need to drink here”);
npcTalk(“Ok one black skull ale coming up, 8 coins please”);
--------------------Takes 8 gp from inventory-----------------
sendmessage(“You buy a black skull ale”);
sendmessage(“You drink your black skull ale”);
sendmessage(“Your vision blurs”);
sendmessage(“The bartender signs your card”);
playerTalk(“hiccup”);
playerTalk(“hiccup”);
}
}

CASE 2: “no coins” private void Alfred3() {
npcTalk(“Are you sure you look a bit skinny for that”);
playerTalk(“Just give me watever drink I need to drink here”);
npcTalk(“Ok one black skull ale coming up, 8 coins please”);
sendmessage(“You dont have enough coins for the beer”);
}
}[/code]

Part 7

Talk to Bartender in Varrock (The blue moon inn):

	[code]public void run() {
	npcTalk("What can I do yer for?");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"A glass of your finest ale please", "Can you recommend anywhere an adventurer might make his fortune?", "Do you know where I can get some good equipment?", "I'm doing Alfred Grimhand's barcrawl"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		ale2();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		fortune();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		equipment();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		Alfred4();
	}
}

Case 1: coins private void ale2() {
NpcTalk(“No problemo”);
NpcTalk(“That’ll be 2 coins”);
sendmessage(“You buy a pint of beer”);
}
}
Case 2: no coins private void ale2() {
NpcTalk(“No problemo”);
NpcTalk(“That’ll be 2 coins”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money.”);
}
}
private void fortune() {
npcTalk(“Ooh I don’t know if I should be giving away information”);
npcTalk(“Makes the computer game too easy”);
int choice = showMenu(new String[] {“Oh ah well”, “Computer game? What are you talking about?”, “Just a small clue?”});
if(choice == 0) {
oowell();
} else if(choice == 1) {
pcgame();
} else if(choice == 2) {
smallclue();
}
}
private void oowell() {
}
}
private void pcgame() {
NpcTalk(“This world around us…”);
NpcTalk(“is all a computer game…”);
NpcTalk(“called Runescape”);
playerTalk(“Nope, still don’t understand what you are talking about”);
playerTalk(“What’s a computer?”);
NpcTalk(“It’s a sort of magic box thing,”);
NpcTalk(“which can do all sorts of different things”);
playerTalk(“I give up”);
playerTalk(“You’re obviously completely mad!”);
}
}
private void smallclue() {
npcTalk(“Go and talk to the bartender at the Jolly Boar Inn”);
npcTalk(“He doesn’t seem to mind giving away clues”);
}
}
CASE 1: coins private void Alfred4() {
npcTalk(“Oh no not another of you guys”);
npcTalk(“These barbarian barcrawls cause too much damage to my bar”);
npcTalk(“You’re going to have to pay 50 gold for the Uncle Humphrey’s gutrot”);
--------------------Takes 50 gp from inventory-----------------
sendmessage(“You buy some gutrot”);
sendmessage(“You drink the gutrot”);
sendmessage(“your insides feel terrible”);
sendmessage(“The bartender signs your card”);
playerTalk(“Blearrgh”);
}
}
CASE 2: no coins private void Alfred4() {
npcTalk(“Oh no not another of you guys”);
npcTalk(“These barbarian barcrawls cause too much damage to my bar”);
npcTalk(“You’re going to have to pay 50 gold for the Uncle Humphrey’s gutrot”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money.”);
}
}[/code]
Part 8

Talk to Bartender: By varrock Wildy (Jolly Boar Inn):

	[code]public void run() {
	npcTalk("Yes please?");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"I'll have a beer please", "Any hints where I can go adventuring", "Heard any good gossip?", "I'm doing Alfred Grimhand's barcrawl"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		beer3();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		hintadven();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		gossip();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		Alfred5();
	}
}

Case 1: coins private void beer3() {
NpcTalk(“Ok that’ll be 2 coins”);
sendmessage(“You buy a pint of beer”);
}
}
Case 2: no coins private void beer3() {
NpcTalk(“Ok that’ll be 2 coins”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}
private void hintadven() {
npcTalk(“It’s funny you should say that”);
npcTalk(“An adventurer passed through here, the other day,”);
npcTalk(“claiming to have found a dungeon full of treasure,”);
npcTalk(“guarded by vicious skeletal warriors”);
npcTalk(“He said he found the entrance in a ruined town”);
npcTalk(“deep in the woods to the west of here, behind the palace”);
npcTalk(“Now how much faith you put in that story is up to you,”);
npcTalk(“but it probably wouldn’t do any harm to have a look”);
playerTalk(“Thanks”);
playerTalk(“I may try that at some point”);
}
}
private void gossip() {
npcTalk(“I’m not that well up on the gossip out here”);
npcTalk(“I’ve heard that the bartender in the Blue Moon Inn has gone a little crazy”);
npcTalk(“He keeps claiming he is part of something called a computer game”);
npcTalk(“What that means, I don’t know”);
npcTalk(“That’s probably old news by now though”);
}
}
CASE 1: coins private void Alfred5() {
npcTalk(“Ah, there seems to be a fair few doing that one these days”);
npcTalk(“My supply of Olde Suspiciouse is starting to run low”);
npcTalk(“It’ll cost you 10 coins”);
--------------------Takes 10 gp from inventory-----------------
sendmessage(“You buy a pint of Olde Suspiciouse”);
sendmessage(“You gulp it down”);
sendmessage(“Your head is spinning”);
sendmessage(“The bartender signs your card”);
playerTalk(“Thanksh very mush”);
}
}
CASE 2: no coins private void Alfred5() {
npcTalk(“Ah, there seems to be a fair few doing that one these days”);
npcTalk(“My supply of Olde Suspiciouse is starting to run low”);
npcTalk(“It’ll cost you 10 coins”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}[/code]

Part 9

Talk to Bartender: On Brimhaven (The Deadman’s chest):

	[code]public void run() {
	npcTalk("Yohoho me hearty what would you like to drink?");
	int choice = showMenu(new String[] {"Nothing thankyou", "A pint of Grog please", "A bottle of rum please", "I'm doing Alfred Grimhand's barcrawl"});
	if(choice == 0) {
		nothingthanks();
	} else if(choice == 1) {
		Grognow();
	} else if(choice == 2) {
		Rumnow();
	} else if(choice == 3) {
		Alfred6();
	}
}	
	private void nothingthanks() {
	}
}

CASE 1: coins private void Grognow() {
npcTalk(“One grog coming right up”);
npcTalk(“That’ll be 3 gold”);
--------------------Takes 3 gp from inventory-----------------
sendmessage(“You buy a pint of Grog”);
}
}
Case 2: “no coins” private void Grognow() {
npcTalk(“One grog coming right up”);
npcTalk(“That’ll be 3 gold”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}

CASE 1: coins private void Rumnow() {
NpcTalk(“That’ll be 27 gold”);
sendmessage(“You buy a bottle of rum”);
}
}
Case 2: no coins sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);

CASE 1: coins private void Alfred6() {
npcTalk(“Haha time to be breaking out the old supergrog”);
npcTalk(“That’ll be 15 coins please”);
--------------------Takes 15 gp from inventory-----------------
sendmessage(“The bartender serves you a glass of strange thick dark liquid”);
sendmessage(“You wince and drink it”);
sendmessage(“You stagger backwards”);
sendmessage(“You think you see 2 bartenders signing 2 barcrawl cards”);
}
}
CASE 2: no coins private void Alfred6() {
npcTalk(“Haha time to be breaking out the old supergrog”);
npcTalk(“That’ll be 15 coins please”);
sendmessage(“Oh dear. I don’t seem to have enough money”);
}
}[/code]

Part 10

Reading your barclaw card after coming from deadmans chest (lasts 5-10mins):

	[code]sendmessage("You are to drunk to be able to read the barcrawl card");[/code]

Part 11

Reading you barclaw card after youve completed doing the quest:

	[code]sendmessage("The official Alfred Grimhand barcrawl");
	sendmessage("The jolly boar inn - complete");
	sendmessage("The blue moon in - complete");
	sendmessage("The rising sun - not complete");
	sendmessage("The dead man's chest - complete");
	sendmessage("The forester's arms - complete");
	sendmessage("The rusty anchor - complete");[/code]

PArt 12

Completing The Barcrawl MiniQuest: barbarian guard:

	[code]public void run() {
	npcTalk("So hows the barcrawl coming along?");
	npcTalk("I think I jusht about done them all, but I losht count");
	sendmessage("You give the card to the barbarian");
	-------------------item: "barcrawl card" removed from inventory-----------------
	npcTalk("Yep that seems fine");
	npcTalk("I never learned to read, but you look like you've drunk plenty");
	npcTalk("You can come in now");[/code]

Read full topic
